text: "Plastic Brit" is a rude insult that is used towards sportspeople who were not born in the United Kingdom but were chosen to compete for Great Britain. It was mainly used by the Daily Mail in the build up to the 2012 Summer Olympics.Tiffany Porter to lead Team GB at World Indoor Championships | Mail Online It was argued against by some of the sportspeople who were called "Plastic Brits", including Yamilé Aldama who wrote a page against it in The Guardian.Yamilé Aldama: Plastic Brit jibe is so offensive in our country today | Sport | The Observer ==Sources== Category:English words and phrases Category:Pejoratives Category:Subculture Category:British culture
title: Plastic Brit
